title: Free Rotation Splash Screen Evelynn Splash Needs Repositioning
body:
[As can be seen here](http://puu.sh/oLlSn/4a10afe680.png) the launcher splash screen shows Evelynn's splash being offset and does not display her, only part of her leg and part of her chest.

I'm going to pass on the opportunity to make some jokes solely because this bugs me a bit too much.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue - lemme see what's going on in regards to an update.
Bumping because this is still being an issue.
